attributes.action: Invite Honda to extend the "Clarity" to the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With Climate Change being a very real concern for modern britain, Honda has developed a Hydrogen Fuel Cell powered car which is both affordable and practical.  The government should invite Honda to extend the roll out of this to British shores as soon as possible, and support in any way it can the provision of a viable "Hydrogen Infrastructure" to aid its successful deployment, or at the very least not 'bail out' British Car Manufacturers without the condition they invest in similar R&D.
